meanings.definition: The action or skill of reading written or printed matter.
meanings.sent1: Her reading improved after practicing every day.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading books in my free time.
meanings.sent3: The cat's reading of the newspaper was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His reading of the situation was spot on.
meanings.sent5: The child's reading of the story was filled with excitement.

meanings.definition: The interpretation of data or information.
meanings.sent1: The scientist's reading of the experiment results was insightful.
meanings.sent2: She relied on her reading of the weather forecast to plan the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The robot's reading of the map led it to the wrong destination.
meanings.sent4: His reading of the stock market trends was accurate.
meanings.sent5: The detective's reading of the clues solved the mystery.

meanings.definition: The act of understanding or comprehending something.
meanings.sent1: Her reading of the poem's meaning was deep.
meanings.sent2: I had a clear reading of the instructions.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's reading of the audience's reaction was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His reading of her emotions was empathetic.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's reading of the students' confusion helped clarify the topic.
